The Blog

Japji Meditation Day

I have attended and lead group sadhana in the past, and during this time recited Japji, but I have not recited Japji everyday. Now after only 4 days into SpiritVoyage’s 40 day Japji sadhana I have found the effects to be numerous.

The hour after I’ve done the Japji meditation, I find my mind starts repeating different parts of this sacred text. A different Pauree will keep repeating in my head and sometimes through out the day. I feel calm and relaxed afterwards. Even though I am calm my brain is working overtime. Thinking about very creative and visionary topics for my personal plans, and how to reach others through the teachings of Kundalini Yoga. I even thought of a workshop to teach while sleeping last night.

Continue reading "Japji Meditation Day"

Yogi Tea and Vegan Banana Bread

Yogi Tea

This tea is known to be good for the blood and colon, the nervous system and bones, as well for any colds, flus or physical weakness.

  • 13 sticks of cinnamon
  • 2 large handfuls ginger (skinned and chopped in lengths)
  • 3 tbsp cardamom seeds (crushed, use a knife or rolling pin)

Kundalini Yoga Teacher Training

For PranaShanti

Kundalini Yoga Teacher Training Experience

How do you energize and balance your mind, body, and spirit? How do you connect with this world, while staying sane through these changing times? How do you keep your physical body strong, flexible, and relaxed? How do we conquer the mind with the breath? How can we rid our self of blocks and fears? If you have ever wondered about these questions, and if you have ever wanted a life full of love, happiness, and health, then Kundalini Yoga Teacher Training is the answer for you.

Portabella Mushrooms with Rice

  • 2 large portabellas

  • handful of asparagus
  • 1 can of kidney beans
  • handful of pea sprouts

Kale Soup

Ingredients:

  • 2 large bunches of Kale
  • 1 large Onion
  • 4 Garlic Cloves
  • 2 Leeks
  • 2 cups Baby Portabella Mushrooms
  • 2 medium Carrots
  • 2 Celery Stems

About YogiSTRONG

YogiSTRONG is an independent Yoga practice, owned and operated by Gurumantra Kaur (Josephine Fanelli). Based in Concord, NH, Gurumantra is an instructor of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan.
